name: Two Creatures and the Fence of Stone
name_original: Two Creatures and the Fence of Stone
description:
there is this one fence
separating the garden from the city
the trees from the buildings
and one day
two creatures just happened to walk past it

FEATURES

✿ 3h ~ playtime
✿ 20k + words of walking around and-
✿ four three two creatures!
✿ and a fence of stone!
